decks.notes: This deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures like Vivi Ornitier and Marauding Mako to pressure the opponent early on. It also includes spells like Into the Flood Maw and Abrade to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The key concept of this deck is to maintain a steady stream of threats while utilizing card advantage tools like Profit's Eidetic Memory and Agatha's Soul Cauldron to outvalue the opponent. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Quantum Riddler and Tersa Lightshatter provide additional flexibility and utility in various situations.

The main concept of this Aggro Red Deck Wins archetype is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. By playing efficient threats like Nova Hellkite and Razorkin Needlehead while also utilizing powerful burn spells like Lightning Strike and Burst Lightning, the deck aims to reduce the opponent's life total as quickly as possible. Additionally, cards like Emberheart Challenger and Burnout Bashtronaut provide additional pressure and reach to close out games swiftly. The deck also includes some disruptive elements like Soulstone Sanctuary to help maintain momentum and protect key creatures.

The deck focuses on a fast-paced, aggressive playstyle using a combination of low-cost creatures and removal spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing cards like Tinybones Joins Up and Tragic Trajectory to disrupt the opponent's strategy, as well as high-powered creatures like Overlord of the Balemurk and Cosmogrand Zenith to deal significant damage, the goal is to close out the game before the opponent has a chance to stabilize. With a mix of creatures, removal, and mana fixing, the Orzhov Aggro deck aims to maintain pressure and tempo throughout the game.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive playstyle, utilizing a mix of cheap creatures and powerful spells to quickly deal damage and control the board. The deck focuses on combining red and blue cards to create a synergistic strategy that can apply pressure early in the game and maintain control throughout. By utilizing a mix of creatures with spells and card draw, this deck aims to outpace the opponent and secure victory before they have a chance to stabilize.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and direct damage spells. By utilizing cards like Nova Hellkite, Scalding Viper, and Lightning Strike, the deck aims to quickly reduce the opponent's life total while maintaining board presence. Additionally, cards like Soulstone Sanctuary and Riverpyre Verge provide additional utility and card advantage to keep the pressure on the opponent. Overall, the deck aims to consistently deal damage to the opponent and close out the game before the opponent can stabilize.

This deck focuses on fast, aggressive gameplay with a combination of burn spells and aggressive creatures to quickly reduce the opponent's life total. It aims to control the board early on with removal spells and then close out the game with powerful creatures like Nova Hellkite and Burnout Bashtronaut. The deck also includes cards like Soulstone Sanctuary and Ojer Axonil for added resilience and card advantage. Overall, the strategy revolves around dealing damage quickly and efficiently to secure a victory before the opponent can stabilize.

The deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and spells, utilizing a combination of card draw and burn spells to maintain momentum. By efficiently deploying threats like Marauding Mako and Vivi Ornitier, while disrupting the opponent with counterspells like Spell Pierce, the deck aims to establish an early advantage and press the attack. It also features a mix of flying and unblockable creatures to evade opposing defenses, with support from cards like Quantum Riddler and Soulstone Sanctuary to generate additional value. Overall, the deck's strategy revolves around consistent pressure and efficient resource management.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and spells in the colors of blue and red. By utilizing a combination of creature removal, direct damage, and card advantage, the deck aims to establish a strong board presence and quickly reduce the opponent's life total to zero. With a mix of low-cost creatures and powerful instant/sorcery spells, the deck is designed to apply pressure early and maintain tempo throughout the game. Additionally, the inclusion of card draw and graveyard recursion cards helps to ensure the deck has the resources it needs to stay ahead in the match.

The main concept of this Dimir Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of efficient creatures and disruptive spells. By playing aggressively with cards like Spyglass Siren and Floodpits Drowner, while also disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Spell Pierce and Tragic Trajectory, the deck aims to control the pace of the game and secure victory. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Kaito, Bane of Nightmares and Cecil, Dark Knight for added power and versatility in combat. With a mix of aggression and disruption, this deck aims to outpace and outmaneuver the opposition.

The deck focuses on maintaining control of the board through counterspells, removal, and board wipes, while also generating card advantage and value through card draw and scrying effects. It aims to outvalue the opponent and grind them out with powerful finishers like Elspeth, Storm Slayer and Pinnacle Starcage. The deck also has some proactive threats like Beza, the Bounding Spring and Marang River Regent to apply pressure and close out games. With a mix of removal, counterspells, card draw, and finishers, the deck seeks to establish and maintain control of the game state.

This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay by utilizing a combination of evasive creatures and disruptive spells in the Dimir color combination. The key strategy is to quickly apply pressure to the opponent with cards like Spyglass Siren and Floodpits Drowner, while also using control elements like Multiversal Passage and Phantom Interference to maintain card advantage and disrupt the opponent's plans. The deck aims to win the game quickly by overwhelming the opponent with a mix of aggressive creatures and powerful spells, all while maintaining a level of control over the game.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively use cheap spells and creatures to quickly deal damage to the opponent. The deck focuses on combining cards that provide card advantage, such as Proft's Eidetic Memory and Winternight Stories, with aggressive creatures like Marauding Mako and Steamcore Scholar. The deck also includes disruptive spells like Fear of Missing Out and Torch the Tower to control the board and maintain pressure on the opponent. Additionally, the deck includes powerful late-game threats like Into the Flood Maw and Tersa Lightshatter to close out games quickly.

The key concept of this Dimir Aggro deck is to control the board with disruptive creatures like Spyglass Siren and Floodpits Drowner, while also maintaining card advantage through Enduring Curiosity and Soulstone Sanctuary. By playing aggressive threats like Azure Beastbinder and Preacher of the Schism, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan with cards like Phantom Interference and Tragic Trajectory. The deck also includes removal spells like Bitter Triumph and Strategic Betrayal to deal with opposing threats and maintain its tempo advantage.

The deck focuses on utilizing counterspells, board wipes, and card draw to control the game and outvalue the opponent. It relies on a combination of disruptive spells and powerful threats to maintain control and tempo. By efficiently managing resources, the deck aims to survive the early game, stabilize the board, and eventually overwhelm the opponent with card advantage and superior threats. The key strategy is to consistently answer threats while building up card advantage and board presence to secure victory.

The main focus of this Boros Aggro deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent using efficient creatures and burn spells. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays and maintain a steady stream of threats on the board. The inclusion of cards like Sheltered by Ghosts and Lightning Helix provide additional damage and support, while Rockface Village and Sunbillow Verge help with mana consistency. Overall, the deck is designed to apply pressure early and maintain momentum throughout the game to secure a victory.

The main focus of this deck is to heavily control the game through a combination of removal spells, counterspells, and disruptive cards. By utilizing cards like Dispelling Exhale, Authority of the Consuls, and Get Lost, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while building towards powerful finishers like Ultima, Jeskai Revelation, and Marang River Regent. The deck also contains various card draw and ramp spells to ensure consistent access to its key cards. With a mix of control and powerful late-game threats, this Jeskai Control deck aims to out-value and outlast its opponents.
